mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.create_at, b.update_at, b.views, u.user_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no where u.admin=0 and b.status='Y'
SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.create_at, b.update_at, b.views, u.user_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no where u.admin=2 and b.status='Y'
SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.create_at, b.update_at, b.views, u.user_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no WHERE u.admin=0 and b.board_id=#{boardId}
SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.create_at, b.update_at, b.views, u.user_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no WHERE u.admin=2 and b.board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (user_no, title, content, create_at, views, status) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 'Y');

INSERT INTO board_files (board_id, file_name, file_original_name, file_path, file_type, file_size, uploaded_at) SELECT (#{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{fileOriginalName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, NOW()); FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no SET b.title = #{title}, b.content = #{content}, b.update_at = NOW(), b.views = #{views}, u.user_id = #{userId} WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId};
update board set views = views +1 where board_id=#{boardId}
UPDATE board b b.status='N' WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId};
mapper.select: SELECT bf.file_id, bf.file_name, bf.file_original_name, bf.file_path, bf.file_type, bf.file_size, bf.uploaded_at FROM board_files bf WHERE bf.board_id = #{boardId};
